entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this afternoon then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
